00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup EXTI_Examples EXTI
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup WakeUp_DeepSleepMode1
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define LOWPOWER_MODE_WFI                        (1)
00047 
00048 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 void LowPower_EXTI_Configuration(void);
00050 void LowPower_Enter(void);
00051 
00052 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00054   * @brief  Main program.
00055   * @retval None
00056   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00057 int main(void)
00058 {
00059   vu32 i;
00060 
00061   RETARGET_Configuration();
00062 
00063   LowPower_EXTI_Configuration();
00064 
00065   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00066   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00067   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00068   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00069   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00070   HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3);
00071 
00072   while (1)
00073   {
00074     for (i = 0; i < 40000000; i++){};
00075 
00076     // If the wakeup souce is active, skip the low power mode.
00077     if (GPIO_ReadInBit(HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PIN) == SET)
00078     {
00079       continue;
00080     }
00081 
00082     HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00083     HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00084     HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED3);
00085 
00086     // You shall make sure the wakeup souce is inactive before enter the low power mode.
00087     LowPower_Enter();
00088     printf("main LOOP!\r\n");
00089 
00090     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3);
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00095   * @brief  EXTI Wakeup configuration.
00096   * @retval None
00097   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00098 void LowPower_EXTI_Configuration(void)
00099 {
00100   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00101 
00102   /* Enable EXTI & GPIO IP clock                                                                            */
00103   CKCUClock.Bit.PB         = 1;
00104   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00105   CKCUClock.Bit.EXTI       = 1;
00106   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00107 
00108   /* Configure GPIO pull down, AFIO mode, and Input Enable                                                  */
00109   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_WAKE_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_GPIO);
00110   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_IN);
00111   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_DOWN);
00112   GPIO_InputConfig(HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_PIN, ENABLE);
00113 
00114   /* Select Port as EXTI Trigger Source                                                                     */
00115   AFIO_EXTISourceConfig(HTCFG_WAKE_GPION, HTCFG_WAKE_GPIO_ID);
00116 
00117   /* EXTI Event Related Configuration                                                                       */
00118   EXTI_WakeupEventConfig(HTCFG_WAKE_EXTI_CHANNEL, EXTI_WAKEUP_HIGH_LEVEL, ENABLE);
00119 
00120   #if (LOWPOWER_MODE_WFI == 1)
00121   /* Configure Event Wake Up Interrupt Channel                                                              */
00122   NVIC_EnableIRQ(EVWUP_IRQn);
00123   #endif
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00127   * @brief  Enter low power mode.
00128   * @retval None
00129   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00130 void LowPower_Enter(void)
00131 {
00132   EXTI_ClearWakeupFlag(HTCFG_WAKE_EXTI_CHANNEL);
00133 
00134   #if (LOWPOWER_MODE_WFI == 1)
00135   EXTI_WakeupEventIntConfig(ENABLE);
00136   PWRCU_DeepSleep1(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFI); // WFI: wakeup by interrupt only
00137   #else
00138   PWRCU_DeepSleep1(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE); // WFE: wakeup by interrupt or EXTI event
00139   #endif
00140 }
00141 
00142 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00143 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00144   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00145   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00146   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00147   * @retval None
00148   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00149 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00150 {
00151   /*
00152      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00153      Debug message can be added here.
00154      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00155   */
00156 
00157   while (1)
00158   {
00159   }
00160 }
00161 #endif
